attributes.action: Put the legal age to buy cigarettes back to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Think of all the poor 16 and 17 year old who thought it was ok to smoke and now they can't. You can have your own house at 16, you can have as many kids as you want at 16 you can even get married at 16 but yet you still can't buy a packet of cigarettes or alcohol.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
